attributes.action: Arctic monkeys have a world tour of WPSIATWIN in 2017
attributes.additional_details: WPSIATWIN is the best album, don't fight me on this
attributes.background: The Fratellis have recently announced a tour of their first album, so why not Arctics? They haven't released AM since 2013, and although Alex has been on tour with tlsp, arctic monkeys fans are missing their favourite band.WPSIATWIN is a legendary album,it deserves to be brought back to the set list
